## EEntityUpdateFlag enum

Flags to indicate required state changes when entities change. Can be combined by bitwise OR.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum EEntityUpdateFlag 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  DrawRequired | <code>1</code> |  |
|  InteractionHandlerUpdateRequired | <code>2</code> |  |
|  NoUpdateRequired | <code>0</code> |  |
|  UpdateAllRequired | <code>3</code> |  |
